about_the_game:
From PinMaster9000 (the creator of Olivia, Lucas and more?) comes Tribute, a co-op action horror game for the PC that casts up to four online players in an epic struggle for survival against swarming Viking hordes.

Set in a confused kit bash mega mashup of ancient warriors and urban jungles, Tribute is the highly anticipated salute to the award-winning #1 co-op game of 2008. This co-operative action horror FPS takes you and your friends through the forsaken streets, parks and cemeteries of the infamous Snake City.

You'll play as one of three Egyptian gods, or perhaps even a Roman general, armed with an array of small but freakishly effective weapons, engaged in a desperate quest to purge and cleanse the neighbourhood.

You're right to be excited, perhaps even scared, but know that this is not actually the greatest game in the world, No.
This Is Just A Tribute!

name: Tribute

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
